title: Power Grid Corp acquires Bhadla-III & Bikaner-III Transmission
description: Power Grid Corporation of India has acquired the project special purpose vehicle Bhadla-III and Bikaner-III Transmission Ltd through tariff-based competitive bidding. This project will establish a transmission system to strengthen interconnections between Bhadla-III and Bikaner-III substations in Rajasthan, operating on a build, own, operate, and transfer basis.
